snippet.title: Three Mile Island shortplay (Apple II - Muse Software)
snippet.description:
Three Mile Island (https://www.mobygames.com/game/apple2/three-mile-island) was a simulator game published by Muse Software in 1979 for the Apple ][. You are the operator of the nuclear reactor at Three Mile Island in Pennsylvania and you need to run the reactor efficiently to generate profit while preventing accidents from happening... and they do happen fast!

Credits:
Cover art - archive.org
Disk image - 4AM
